summary: Client Sarah initiated a requirements meeting. The PM asked for a project name but architect, developer, and QA did not respond, so the project name remains undecided.

actions.task: Propose project name options and circulate to stakeholders for confirmation

backlog_deltas.title: Create backlog item to define and confirm project name

risks.risk: No project name defined may delay requirement gathering and cause miscommunication
risks.mitigation: PM to propose names, set a deadline, and solicit confirmations from Sarah and technical stakeholders (architect, developer, QA)
